users_can_view_own_ai_messages.name: users_can_view_own_ai_messages
users_can_view_own_ai_messages.using:
EXISTS (
                SELECT 1 FROM ai_conversations
                WHERE ai_conversations.id = ai_messages.conversation_id
                AND ai_conversations.user_id = (select auth.uid())
            )

users_can_view_call_participants.name: users_can_view_call_participants
users_can_view_call_participants.using:
user_id = (select auth.uid()) OR
            EXISTS (
                SELECT 1 FROM calls
                JOIN conversation_participants cp ON cp.conversation_id = calls.conversation_id
                WHERE calls.id = call_participants.call_id
                AND cp.user_id = (select auth.uid())
            )

users_can_view_calls_in_their_conversati.name: users_can_view_calls_in_their_conversations
users_can_view_calls_in_their_conversati.using:
EXISTS (
                SELECT 1 FROM conversation_participants
                WHERE conversation_id = calls.conversation_id
                AND user_id = (select auth.uid())
            )

users_can_view_own_group_memberships.name: users_can_view_own_group_memberships
users_can_view_own_group_memberships.using:
EXISTS (
                SELECT 1 FROM contact_groups
                WHERE contact_groups.id = contact_group_memberships.group_id
                AND contact_groups.user_id = (select auth.uid())
            )

users_can_view_own_conversations.name: users_can_view_own_conversations
users_can_view_own_conversations.using:
EXISTS (
                SELECT 1 FROM conversation_participants
                WHERE conversation_id = conversations.id
                AND user_id = (select auth.uid())
            )

users_can_view_files_in_their_conversati.name: users_can_view_files_in_their_conversations
users_can_view_files_in_their_conversati.using:
EXISTS (
                SELECT 1 FROM messages m
                JOIN conversation_participants cp ON cp.conversation_id = m.conversation_id
                WHERE m.id = files.message_id
                AND cp.user_id = (select auth.uid())
                AND cp.left_at IS NULL
            )

users_can_view_messages_in_their_convers.name: users_can_view_messages_in_their_conversations
users_can_view_messages_in_their_convers.using:
EXISTS (
                SELECT 1 FROM conversation_participants
                WHERE conversation_id = messages.conversation_id
                AND user_id = (select auth.uid())
                AND left_at IS NULL
            )

users_can_view_own_profile_and_contacts_.name: users_can_view_own_profile_and_contacts_profiles
users_can_view_own_profile_and_contacts_.using:
id = (select auth.uid()) OR
            is_ai_bot = TRUE OR
            EXISTS (
                SELECT 1 FROM contacts
                WHERE (user_id = (select auth.uid()) AND contact_user_id = users.id AND status = 'accepted')
                   OR (contact_user_id = (select auth.uid()) AND user_id = users.id AND status = 'accepted')
            )
